value.title: IBM to Leverage Watson, Enhance Fantasy Football Experience
value.excerpt: International Business Machines Corporation IBM will be leveraging the AI capabilities of Watson to enrich ESPN Fantasy Football experience for gamers. IBM unveiled a new feature called Trade Assistant (only for mobile iOS and Android) to help gamers make judicious decisions regarding adding and offloading players from the teams.
